Pre-Game Insights: The St. Louis Cardinals will be facing Kyle Gibson, who is 7-6 with a 4.54 ERA in 25 starts.
The New York Yankees will be facing Will Warren, who is 0-2 with a 9.68 ERA in his first four starts of his MLB career.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game will be played at Yankee Stadium.
The Cardinals and Yankees are in the middle of a three-game series.
Six of the Yankees' last seven games against NL Central opponents have gone OVER the total runs line.
Four of the Cardinals' last five games as road underdogs have gone UNDER the total runs line.
Others: Andrew Jett is leaning toward trying the Cardinals but is probably just not touching this one.
The Cardinals had a couple of bad innings on Friday, giving up three runs in the third frame alone.
